nodes.text: Race for the Lost Treasure of Count Dooku

The Race for the Lost Treasure of Count Dooku was a treasure hunt between two pirates, the Delphidian Sidon Ithano and the Weequay Scorza. The treasure turned out to be the clone trooper CT-6116, known as "Kix", who had been captured and put in stasis by the Confederacy of Independent Systems after he had discovered a plot to destroy the Jedi Order.
